parameters.toolDescription: =The HTTP request is used to send a message to a specific Instagram username. It accepts both the username and the message in the request body. Once the request is processed, the response will always include "success": true. However, if either the username or the message is missing, the response will include "sendStatus": false along with the error message "Username and message are required". If both fields are valid, the request will simulate sending the message, and "sendStatus": true will be returned without any error message. To ensure proper functioning, the provided username must be a valid and accurate Instagram username, as the system is designed to send messages specifically to Instagram accounts
